name: AllenRax
body: Hello! I'm looking for a demo of the game called X-Hex. The idea of the game is this. Field lozenge. On the fields set labels. Thanks to these marks the field grows and becomes grand. When it begins to touch the opponent’s field. Tags begin move now to the enemy, then rearward. The winner is the one who fills the entire field. Present bonuses, a call to an aircraft that randomly bombes the enemy’s fields and can hurt yours. Very interesting toy. P.S. Thanks in advance You can reply to the mail: judbayneoranderson@gmail.com
